messages.subject: Re: Dress sizes
messages.msgSnippet: When I was in high school I was tiny, barely 100 pounds at 5 3 .  There was no size 0, and in fact, I wore a size 7/8 most of the time.  That was normal then.
messages.messageBody:
When I was in high school I was tiny, barely 100 pounds at 5'3". There was no size 0, and in fact, I wore a size 7/8 most of the time. That was normal then.

When I was in my late 20s and 25 pounds heavier, and definitely out of shape, I went to buy some ladies Dockers. Shocked the heck out of me to find that a size 4 fit me. I'd never been a size 4, even when very skinny.

I think a size 3 was the smallest, and very hard to find.

Janet

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
